bibl.title: Terracotta Figurines and Popular Religion in Late Antique Egypt: Issues of Continuity and 'Survival'.
Le myrte et la rose. Mélanges offerts à Françoise Dunand par ses élèves, collègues et amis.

bibl.note: Issues surrounding the terracotta figurines of the Roman period. - The Transitional Period (third / fourth centuries AD): continuity or discontinuity? - The late antique terracotta figurines.
bibl.seg: David Frankfurter, Terracotta Figurines and Popular Religion in Late Antique Egypt: Issues of Continuity and 'Survival'.

Gaëlle Tallet & Christiane Zivie-Coche (edd.), Le myrte et la rose. Mélanges offerts à Françoise Dunand par ses élèves, collègues et amis. Tome 1 = CENiM. 9 (Montpellier, 2014) pp. 129-141, 5 pll. n./bl. et coul.
